TrustedTypePolicy.summary: The TrustedTypePolicy interface of the {{domxref("Trusted Types API", "", "", "nocode")}} defines a group of functions which create TrustedType objects.

remarks.para: A TrustedTypePolicy object is created by to define a policy for enforcing security rules on input. Therefore, TrustedTypePolicy has no constructor.

TrustedTypePolicyCreateScriptURL.summary: The createScriptURL() method of the interface creates a object using a policy created by .

TrustedTypePolicyCreateScript.summary: The createScript() method of the interface creates a object using a policy created by .

TrustedTypePolicyCreateHTML.summary: The createHTML() method of the interface creates a object using a policy created by .

TrustedTypePolicyName.summary: The name read-only property of the interface returns the name of the policy.
TrustedTypePolicyName.value: A string containing the name of the policy.
